defined_text = {
	name = GetCanOfferToJoinFactionTT
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_nova_legion_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_nova_legion_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_chosen_ones_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_chosen_ones_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_lanius_horde_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_lanius_horde_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_big_mt_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_big_mt_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_united_front_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_united_front_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_caesars_legion_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_caesars_legion_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
		}
		localization_key = can_offer_to_join_faction_children_of_mexico_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
		}
